attributes.action: Make it legal to turn left at red traffic lights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At most junctions this can be performed at little risk to motorists or pedestrians. Local authorities would be required to assess each junction and add " turn left on red not permitted" signage only where this would be dangerous. This rule work well in United States. It would ease traffic flows and reduce CO2 emisssions.

government_responses.details:
